wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant-General Sir Otto Marling Lund  (28 November 1891 – 15 August 1956) was a senior British Army officer who served as General Officer Commanding-in-Chief Anti-Aircraft Command.

response: *Lieutenant-General Otto Marling Lund , late Royal Regiment of Artillery.
* Major-General Otto Marling Lund, , (6783), late Royal Artillery.
